channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 本周末，中国将在北京举行的年度论坛上向全球高层管理者抛出橄榄枝。
item.description:
China’s bid to woo top global executives at an annual forum in Beijing this weekend is already being clouded by speculation over which top leaders they’ll meet https://t.co/xvxyTa77ea

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在岸人民币跌至四个月来最弱，突破了密切关注的技术水平
item.description:
The onshore yuan fell to its weakest in four months, breaching a closely watched technical level https://t.co/vANVNArg2s

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 由于箱包生产商寻求二次上市的计划可能会损害全球收购公司的收购希望，Samsonite下跌
item.description:
Samsonite dropped as the luggage maker’s plans to pursue a second listing risks hurting hopes for a takeover from global buyout firms https://t.co/PnnFinCBFn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）在上海市中心开设了一家规模宏大的新店，标志着苹果公司将中国作为市场和生产基地的承诺。
item.description:
Apple CEO Tim Cook opens an expansive new store in central Shanghai, signaling his company’s commitment to China as a market and production base.

Cook emerged from the store at 7 p.m. to thunderous applause from the crowd, shaking hands and hugging fans https://t.co/N8N3qcQZdp pic.twitter.com/74dbmDZREU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: IndiGo 正在探索购买宽体飞机，此举将加剧与印度航空公司的竞争
item.description:
IndiGo is exploring the purchase of widebody aircraft, a move that would intensify competition with Air India https://t.co/U4Xk2SzCsi

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 碧桂园和万科下周的财报将显示中国房地产问题对世界第二大经济体的伤害程度。
item.description:
Earnings from Country Garden and Vanke next week should indicate the extent to which China’s property woes are hurting the world’s second-largest economy https://t.co/clTYbGb4iF

item.title: 彭博社对经济学家的调查显示，日本央行将在 10 月前再次加息
item.description:
The Bank of Japan will raise interest rates again by October, according to a Bloomberg survey of economists https://t.co/7O6RnLbYiS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 全球航空业长期以来一直警告乘客，他们最终将不得不为航空旅行去碳化的 5 万亿美元成本支付一部分费用。
item.description:
The global airline industry has long warned passengers they’ll eventually have to pay some of the $5 trillion cost of decarbonizing air travel.

That moment has come https://t.co/o1E35iPDKK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 据分析师称，台湾央行出人意料地决定提高利率以应对顽固的通货膨胀，这很可能是台湾央行本轮加息的最后一次决定
item.description: Taiwan central bank’s unexpected decision to raise interest rates to counter stubborn inflation will likely be its last for this cycle, according to analysts https://t.co/ElDxPpq0Bw

item.title: 这个世界上人口最多的国家刚刚创下了自 2008 年以来房屋销售业绩最好的一年，帮助印度的房地产经纪人变成了有影响力的名人
item.description: The world’s most populous country just recorded its best year for home sales since 2008, helping turn India's realtors into influencers and celebrities https://t.co/u4Aq0tIqn6

item.title: 日本通胀加速，达到四个月来最快速度，这将使市场继续关注日本央行是否会在 2007 年以来首次加息后再次加息。
item.description:
Japan’s inflation accelerated to the quickest pace in four months, which will keep markets focused on whether the BOJ might follow its first interest rate hike since 2007 with an encore https://t.co/B25dLbBUzl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 英国消费者的个人财务状况是自 2021 年以来最乐观的，这表明家庭预算在经历了去年短暂的经济衰退后仍具有弹性
item.description:
UK consumers are at their most upbeat about their personal finances since 2021, suggesting household budgets remain resilient after the economy’s brief recession last year https://t.co/n3MDT6e9ch

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 印度板球超级联赛在这个板球之国的回归，预计将掀起长达数月的消费热潮，包括饮料、酒店和食品配送等
item.description:
The return of the Indian Premier League in the cricket-mad country is expected to kickstart a monthslong spending spree for things like drinks, hotels and food delivery https://t.co/HtgT8vwknF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 加州计划在下周出售 26 亿美元的债券，这是今年市政市场的第二大发售活动
item.description:
California plans to sell $2.6 billion of bonds next week in the municipal market’s second-largest offering this year https://t.co/aV5k3XN6fv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）在为援助乌克兰提供资金、建造新的核反应堆并努力使国家对商业更加友好的同时，也在向政府施加压力，要求其节约预算。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron is ramping up pressure on his government to find budget savings at the same time as funding aid to Ukraine, building new nuclear reactors and seeking to make his country friendlier for business https://t.co/eGVGKz98A9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 一名巴西裔美国商人因涉嫌利用瑞士信贷、瑞银和其他瑞士银行向美国国税局隐藏 2,000 多万美元资产而被起诉
item.description:
A Brazilian-American businessman was indicted for allegedly using Credit Suisse, UBS and other Swiss banks to hide more than $20 million in assets from the IRS https://t.co/nNFFbTqn07

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）批准向乌克兰提供 8.8 亿美元，而美国的援助仍处于停滞状态
item.description:
The IMF approves $880 million for Ukraine, as aid from the US remains stalled https://t.co/jfr3TrmqR3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 由于经济疲软导致进口需求降温，新西兰的年度贸易赤字收窄至 2022 年中期以来的最小值
item.description:
New Zealand’s annual trade deficit narrowed to the smallest since mid-2022 as a weaker economy cools demand for imports https://t.co/cSpElhCuce

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 智利移动运营商 WOM 的债券崩盘，穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将该公司的信用等级进一步下调至垃圾级，因为该公司正努力说服投资者其有能力管理 11 月到期的 3.48 亿美元债券付款。
item.description:
Bonds from mobile operator WOM Chile collapsed as Moody’s Ratings cut the company’s credit score deeper into junk as it struggles to convince investors it can manage a $348 million bond payment due in November. https://t.co/ni8nZeyH0J

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 随着监管机构的围追堵截，苹果公司的投资者也开始担心罚款和市场主导地位受到威胁：晚间简报
item.description:
As regulators circle, Apple investors are becoming unnerved by fears of fines and threats to the gadget maker’s market dominance: Here’s your Evening Briefing https://t.co/2o2eMw1epX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 由于对比特币 ETF 现货的需求萎缩，比特币从历史高点回落了 10%以上，摩根大通警告称，比特币的回落还有加深的空间。
item.description:
Bitcoin has peeled back more than 10% from a record high as the appetite for spot Bitcoin ETFs contracted and JPMorgan warns the retreat has room to deepen https://t.co/WvQpw1OESQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 工资停滞不前。储蓄账户几乎没有利息。永远负担不起的抵押贷款。日本央行历史性地调整利率后，这一切都将被抛在脑后
item.description:
Stagnant salaries. Savings accounts that pay almost no interest. Mortgages that never become unaffordable. Japan is leaving it all behind following the central bank's historic rate shift https://t.co/Pjx8pA7SkU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 全球通胀担忧的缓解使瑞士央行意外降息，为美联储采取行动铺平了道路
item.description:

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 欧盟领导人同意与波黑展开入盟谈判，因为该集团寻求将这个分裂的西巴尔干国家拉近其轨道，以对抗俄罗斯日益增长的影响力
item.description:
EU leaders agreed to open membership talks with Bosnia-Herzegovina as the bloc seeks to pull a divided Western Balkan country closer into its orbit to counter growing Russian influence https://t.co/FViawQSHYH
